## Academics
My name is Abigail Khamofu and I am 15 years old. I am a passionate and dedicated student currently attending [International Community School(ICS)](https://www.icsabuja.com/), where I excel academically while actively participating in extracurricular activities. I have a strong interest in singing and playing football. 

## Other Achievements

### Competitions
I have participated in various musical competitions and achieved many certificates and awards for both solo and choir performances. In my former school, Rainbow College, I  showcased my leadership and teamwork skills by leading my girls football team to victory in different competitions as well as participating in the girls volleyball team.

### Community Service
My commitment to community service is evident through my involvement in providing for needy schools and orphanages. I do this driven by a desire to support those who may not have the same opportunities as others. Through my efforts, I have been able to provide food, clothes, and writing supplies for the children. Meeting those children has taught me many lessons such as contentment, selflessness, and compassion. Looking ahead, I plan to continue my work with orphanages and collaborate with local businesses to secure more resources for them, hopefully inspiring others to get involved as well.
